headline: Amazon grocery push sinks Kroger, Instacart, delivery stocks
summary: Investing.com -- Kroger (NYSE:KR) stock fell 1.6% Tuesday, while Instacart (NASDAQ:CART) tumbled 5% after Amazon (NASDAQ:AMZN) announced plans to double down on its online grocery delivery services and expand Whole Foods Market locations.

headline: 3 Reasons KR is Risky and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: Over the past six months, Kroger’s shares (currently trading at $63.75) have posted a disappointing 8% loss, well below the S&P 500’s 8.2% gain. This might have investors contemplating their next move.
